hooks.prompt:
[doc-guardian] QUICK drift check (DO NOT block workflow):

1. ONLY check if the modified file is referenced in README.md, CLAUDE.md, or API docs in the SAME directory
2. Do NOT read files or perform deep analysis - just note potential drift based on file name/path
3. If potential drift: output a single line like '[doc-guardian] Note: {filename} changed - may affect {doc}. Run /doc-sync to verify.'
4. If no obvious drift: say nothing

IMPORTANT: This is notification-only. Do NOT read documentation files, do NOT make changes, do NOT use any tools. Just a quick mental check based on the file path.
